    • Method Detail

      • check

        protected com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck.Result check(Socket socket)
        Description copied from class: SocketHealthCheck
        Perform a check of a Socket.

        Implementations can assume that the Socket is already connected.

        Specified by:
        check in class SocketHealthCheck
        Parameters:
        socket - the Socket to check the health of
        Returns:
        if the component is healthy, a healthy Result; otherwise, an unhealthy Result with a description of the error or exception
